# <a name="change-your-language-date-and-time-format-or-time-zone-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="0431d-102">Cambiar el idioma, el formato de fecha y hora o la zona horaria en Outlook en la web</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0431d-102">Change your language, date and time format, or time zone in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="0431d-103">En la parte superior de la página, selecciona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0431d-103">At the top of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="0431d-104">**Configuración** > **ver todas las opciones de configuración de Outlook**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0431d-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings**.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="0431d-105">Seleccione \*\*\*\* > **idioma y hora**generales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0431d-105">Select **General** > **Language and time**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="0431d-106">Seleccione el idioma que desea usar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0431d-106">Select the language you want to use.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="0431d-107">Haga clic en **Guardar**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0431d-107">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0431d-108">Para obtener más información, vea [cambiar la configuración de zona horaria e idioma en Outlook en la web](https://support.office.com/article/65239869-12e7-4a9d-bca1-76b0ad7ce273).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0431d-108">To learn more, see [Change the time zone and language settings in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/65239869-12e7-4a9d-bca1-76b0ad7ce273).</span></span>
